similar.title: How we make choices and sacrifices in medical education during the COVID-19 pandemic.
text: How we make choices and sacrifices in medical education during the COVID-19 pandemic.
In this commentary, we highlight some of the pressing choices and sacrifices we must make in medical education during the COVID-19 pandemic.
